title: Yi's spooky encounter
body:
I was on aram yesterday as fidd, when yi hit level 6. Our team was pretty low so he popped his highlander and charged us. i instinctively used fear on him, but instead of doing that lanky fear run, he sprinted at full speed into his tower!

I was wondering if this is intentional or not? cuz, like, he ran pretty damn far away

replies.body:
Yes it's intentional. While the fear still applies, he can't be slowed by any source, so it's normal. 

{{champion:39}}
Master Yis best ability is to run in fear, after all.
can't be slowed... can't be slowed... {{champion:11}}
